      • getPublicRequestParameters

        public String[] getPublicRequestParameters(org.hippoecm.hst.component.support.bean.BaseHstComponent comp,
                                           org.hippoecm.hst.core.component.HstRequest request,
                                           String paramName)
        Deprecated. please use HST native BaseHstComponent#getPublicRequestParameters()
        Returns an array of values for a public request parameter. For use of multiple checkboxes
        Parameters:
        request -
        paramName -
        Returns:
        String[] value of the request parameter. null if the parameter does not exist or is empty.
